dmft 0.1.0

Plot temporal trends by region

Source: R/visualization.R
dmft_plot_trends.Rd

Plot temporal trends by region

Usage

dmft_plot_trends(
  estimates,
  projections = NULL,
  regions = NULL,
  title = "DMFT Temporal Trends"
)

Arguments

estimates

Predictions from dmft_predict().

projections

Optional projections from dmft_project().

regions

Character vector of regions to plot (default: all).

title

Optional title.

Value

A ggplot2::ggplot object.
